name: YouTube rm scrolling-header-bar and 0-left-margin
description:
Make the search bar scroll with the rest of the page. This enables you to shrink a window, and scroll slightly, to only show video content. This fixes the titlebar/header/logo taking up so much space, by making the masthead positioner absolute. 
-- 
Also remove the left-hand padding.
additional_info:
